Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-4. A patched version of the package is available.
